structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 66. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] If any provisions of sections thirty-eight A1/2 to thirty-eight O, inclusive, or the applications of such provisions to any person or circumstance are held invalid or unconstitutional, the other provisions of said sections or the application of such provisions to any person or circumstance other than that as to which it is held invalid or unconstitutional shall not be affected thereby.
